co.there4.hexagon.web

Class Exchange

  • co.there4.hexagon.web.Exchange

  • public class Exchange

    HTTP request context. It holds client supplied data and methods to change the response.

        HTTP request context. It holds client supplied data and methods to change the response.

        Parameters:
        attributes - Exchange attributes(for the current request).Same as HttpServletRequest.setAttribute().
